snippet: As Carmelo Anthony and Kevin Garnett put aside their differences before Sunday’s All-Star Game, Hall of Fame finalists were announced, including the former Knick Bernard King.
abstract: NBA Roundup; New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony and Boston Celtics forward Kevin Garnett put aside their differences, enjoying spotlight during NBA All-Star weekend; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: As Carmelo Anthony and Kevin Garnett put aside their differences before Sunday’s All-Star Game, Hall of Fame finalists were announced, including the former Knick Bernard King.

headline.seo: Carmelo Anthony and Kevin Garnett Unite for a Weekend, at Least
headline.main: For a Weekend, at Least, Anthony and Garnett Unite
headline.print_headline: For a Weekend, at Least, Anthony and Garnett Unite
